description: I. Letter dated 16/12/2009 from Ed Balls MP to Barry Sheerman MP regarding the Lamb inquiry into parental confidence in the special educational needs system. 1 p. II. Letter dated 16/12/2009 from Ed Balls MP to Brian Lamb regarding response to the final inquiry into the special educational needs system. 5 p. III. Special educational needs and parental confidence. 102 p.
department: Dept for Children, Schools and Families
